mapper.select: /* file : BannerMapper.xml, id : getBannerList */ SELECT * FROM ST_BANNER AS B LEFT JOIN ST_FILES AS F ON F.REF_SEQ = B.BANNER_SEQ WHERE B.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND USED is not null AND F.REF_TYPE = 'BANNER_IMAGE_PC' AND PC_ORDER != 0 ORDER BY PC_ORDER,B.REG_DATE /*||ORDER BY BANNER_SEQ DESC||*/
